alert.note: Alert for Le Flore; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 10:58PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CRAWFORD...NORTHERN SEBASTIAN...SOUTHEASTERN SEQUOYAH AND NORTHEASTERN LE FLORE COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM CST... At 1057 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Spiro, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Alma... Barling... Pocola... Lavaca... Spiro... Arkoma... Bonanza... Moffett... Bloomer... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Jenny Lind... Kibler... Central City... Concord... Shibley... Scullyville... Braden... Mill Creek... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 3 and 15. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for west central Arkansas...and southeastern Oklahoma.
